TopicTitle: Booster Launcher Attempts (Episode 6 of My Kerbal Space Program Episodes)

Articles.Content:
So I went on today and built a booster launcher, but it didn't done well... it instead killed Kerbals...

Later I decided to put a Kerbal on the seat... but it didn't quite bring the seat down...

And then carrying more stupid stuff.

Anyway, that's probably what my video is all about.

(YES. I did made 8 more KSP videos before, but you'll have to figure out the 2 hidden ones...)

NOTE: Sorry for not having me saying, no subtitles, and bad voice quality. My screencaster (Debut Screen Capture Software Free Version) doesn't use speakers to "hear" the sound --- it uses microphones instead, so I have to attach 2 external speakers and put it near the microphone...)

ANOTHER NOTE: There are some clear spaces, perhaps it is hiding something.

TOP SECRECT: This is the link to my 2 hidden episodes used to make the episode you are seeing: Episode 6.1 and Episode 6.2.
